message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can end the game early.
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm not going to give up too much yet.
You're not giving up enough, Bob. I need a bigger share to make it worth my while.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away too much. You're getting closer, but not close enough yet.
It's getting close to the deadline, Bob. Let's meet in the middle and split it 50/50. It's the fairest way to end this.
